title: Build an Interactive Baseline Characteristic Table
text: code meta_sl_example().
code: adsl <- r2rtf::r2rtf_adsl adsl$TRTA <- adsl$TRT01A adsl$TRTA <- factor(adsl$TRTA,   levels = c("Placebo", "Xanomeline Low Dose", "Xanomeline High Dose"),   labels = c("Placebo", "Low Dose", "High Dose") )  meta <- meta_adam(   population = adsl,   observation = adsl ) |>   define_plan(plan = plan(     analysis = "base_char", population = "apat",     observation = "apat", parameter = "age;gender;race"   )) |>   define_population(     name = "apat",     group = "TRTA",     subset = quote(SAFFL == "Y"),     var = c("USUBJID", "TRTA", "SAFFL", "AGEGR1", "SEX", "RACE")   ) |>   define_observation(     name = "apat",     group = "TRTA",     subset = quote(SAFFL == "Y"),     var = c("USUBJID", "TRTA", "SAFFL", "AGEGR1", "SEX", "RACE")   ) |>   define_parameter(     name = "age",     var = "AGE",     label = "Age (years)",     vargroup = "AGEGR1"   ) |>   define_parameter(     name = "gender",     var = "SEX",     label = "Gender"   ) |>   define_parameter(     name = "race",     var = "RACE",     label = "Race"   ) |>   define_analysis(     name = "base_char",     title = "Participant Baseline Characteristics by Treatment Group",     label = "baseline characteristic table"   ) |>   meta_build()

what: A metadata of the AE subgroup specific analysis
title: Build an Interactive Baseline Characteristic Table
text: vignette, directly use metadata built meta_ae_example().
code: meta_ae <- meta_ae_example()

what: Baseline characteristic table + Participants With Drug-Related AE
title: Build an Interactive Baseline Characteristic Table
code: react_base_char(   metadata_sl = meta,   metadata_ae = meta_ae,   ae_subgroup = c("age", "race", "gender"),   ae_specific = "rel",   width = 1200 )

what: Baseline characteristic table + Participants With Serious AE
title: Build an Interactive Baseline Characteristic Table
code: react_base_char(   metadata_sl = meta,   metadata_ae = meta_ae,   ae_subgroup = c("age", "race", "gender"),   ae_specific = "ser",   width = 1200 )

title: Getting Started with metalite.sl
code: adsl <- r2rtf::r2rtf_adsl adsl$TRTA <- adsl$TRT01A adsl$TRTA <- factor(adsl$TRTA,   levels = c("Placebo", "Xanomeline Low Dose", "Xanomeline High Dose"),   labels = c("Placebo", "Low Dose", "High Dose") )  # Create a variable EOSSTT indicating the end of end of study status adsl$EOSSTT <- sample(x = c("Participants Ongoing", "Discontinued"),                       size = length(adsl$USUBJID),                        prob = c(0.8, 0.2), replace = TRUE) # Create a variable EOTSTT1 indicating the end of treatment status part 1 adsl$EOTSTT1 <- sample(x = c("Completed", "Discontinued"),                       size = length(adsl$USUBJID),                        prob = c(0.85, 0.15), replace = TRUE) plan <- plan(     analysis = "base_char", population = "apat",     observation = "apat", parameter = "age;gender;race"   ) |>   add_plan(     analysis = "disp", population = "apat",     observation = "apat", parameter = "disposition;medical-disposition"       ) |>   add_plan(     analysis = "trt_compliance", population = "apat",     observation = "apat", parameter = "comp8;comp16;comp24"       ) meta <- meta_adam(   population = adsl,   observation = adsl ) |>   define_plan(plan = plan) |>   define_population(     name = "apat",     group = "TRTA",     subset = quote(SAFFL == "Y"),     var = c("USUBJID", "TRTA", "SAFFL", "AGEGR1", "SEX", "RACE", "EOSSTT", "EOTSTT1", "COMP8FL", "COMP16FL", "COMP24FL")        ) |>   define_parameter(     name = "age",     var = "AGE",     label = "Age (years)",     vargroup = "AGEGR1"   ) |>   define_parameter(     name = "gender",     var = "SEX",     label = "Gender"   ) |>   define_parameter(     name = "race",     var = "RACE",     label = "Race"   ) |>   define_parameter(     name = "disposition",     var = "EOSSTT",     label = "Trial Disposition"   ) |>   define_parameter(     name = "medical-disposition",     var = "EOTSTT1",     label = "Participant Study Medication Disposition"   ) |>   metalite::define_parameter(     name = "comp8",     var = "COMP8FL",     label = "Compliance (Week 8)",   ) |>   metalite::define_parameter(     name = "comp16",     var = "COMP16FL",     label = "Compliance (Week 16)",   ) |>   metalite::define_parameter(     name = "comp24",     var = "COMP24FL",     label = "Compliance (Week 24)",   ) |>   define_analysis(     name = "base_char",     title = "Participant Baseline Characteristics by Treatment Group",     label = "baseline characteristic table"   ) |>   define_analysis(     name = "trt_compliance",     title = "Summary of Treatment Compliance",     label = "treatment compliance table"   ) |>   define_analysis(     name = "disp",     title = "Disposition of Participant",     label = "disposition table"   ) |>   meta_build()

title: Getting Started with metalite.sl
code: outdata <- meta |>   prepare_base_char(     parameter = "age;gender;race"   )  outdata ## List of 13 ##  $ meta           :List of 7 ##  $ population     : chr "apat" ##  $ observation    : chr "apat" ##  $ char_var       : chr [1:3] "AGE" "SEX" "RACE" ##  $ char_prop      :List of 3 ##  $ var_type       :List of 3 ##  $ group_label    : Factor w/ 3 levels "Placebo","Low Dose",..: 1 3 2 outdata$n ##                         name n_1 n_2 n_3 n_9999 var_label ## 1       <65 16.27907  9.52381  13.09524 12.99213 Age (years) ## 2       >80 34.88372 34.52381  21.42857 30.31496 Age (years) ## 3     65-80 48.83721 55.95238  65.47619 56.69291 Age (years) ## 4      Mean       NA       NA        NA       NA Age (years) ## title: Getting Started with metalite.sl
code: outdata |> rtf_base_char(   source = "Source: [CDISCpilot: adam-adsl]",   path_outdata = tempfile(fileext = ".Rdata"),   path_outtable = "base_char.rtf" ) ## The outdata is saved in/tmp/RtmpRiBY3F/file192b19e3f716.Rdata ## The output is saved in/home/runner/work/metalite.sl/metalite.sl/vignettes/base_char.rtf

title: Getting Started with metalite.sl
code: outdata <- meta |>   prepare_trt_compliance() outdata ## List of 13 ##  $ meta           :List of 7 ##  $ population     : chr "apat" ##  $ observation    : chr "apat" ##  $ parameter      : chr "comp8;comp16;comp24" ##  $ n              :'data.frame': 1 obs. of  6 variables: ##  $ order          : NULL ##  $ group          : chr "TRTA" ##  $ reference_group: NULL ##  $ char_n         :List of 3 ##  $ char_var       : chr [1:3] "COMP8FL" "COMP16FL" "COMP24FL" ##  $ char_prop      :List of 3 ##  $ var_type       :List of 3 ##  $ group_label    : Factor w/ 3 levels "Placebo","Low Dose",..: 1 3 2 outdata |>    format_trt_compliance(display_col = c("n", "prop"), digits_prop = 3) |>   rtf_trt_compliance(   source = "Source: [CDISCpilot: adam-adsl]",   path_outdata = tempfile(fileext = ".Rdata"),   path_outtable = tempfile(fileext = ".rtf") ) ## The outdata is saved in/tmp/RtmpRiBY3F/file192b7bb36dc2.Rdata ## The output is saved in/tmp/RtmpRiBY3F/file192b33b05f06.rtf

title: Getting Started with metalite.sl
code: outdata <- meta |>   prepare_disposition() outdata ## List of 13 ##  $ meta           :List of 7 ##  $ population     : chr "apat" ##  $ observation    : chr "apat" ##  $ parameter      : chr "disposition;medical-disposition" ##  $ n              :'data.frame': 1 obs. of  6 variables: ##  $ order          : NULL ##  $ group          : chr "TRTA" ##  $ reference_group: NULL ##  $ char_n         :List of 2 ##  $ char_var       : chr [1:2] "EOSSTT" "EOTSTT1" ##  $ char_prop      :List of 2 ##  $ var_type       :List of 2 ##  $ group_label    : Factor w/ 3 levels "Placebo","Low Dose",..: 1 3 2 outdata |>    format_disposition() |>   rtf_disposition(   source = "Source: [CDISCpilot: adam-adsl]",   path_outdata = tempfile(fileext = ".Rdata"),   path_outtable = tempfile(fileext = ".rtf") ) ## The outdata is saved in/tmp/RtmpRiBY3F/file192b13d43107.Rdata ## The output is saved in/tmp/RtmpRiBY3F/file192b6a577855.rtf

title: Authors and Citation
text: Wang B, Zhao Y, Fukuda H (2024). metalite.sl: Subject-level Analysis Using 'metalite'. R package version 0.1.0.
code: @Manual{,   title = {metalite.sl: Subject-level Analysis Using 'metalite'},   author = {Benjamin Wang and Yujie Zhao and Hiroaki Fukuda},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0}, }

title: Subject-level Analysis Using metalite
text: R package designed analysis & reporting subject baseline characteristics clinical trials. assume ADaM datasets ready analysis leverage metalite data structure define inputs outputs.

title: Subject-level Analysis Using metalite
text: general workflow : Define metadata information using metalite. prepare_sl_summary() prepares datasets summary baseline characteristics. format_base_char() formats output layout. rtf_base_char() creates TLFs. quick example
code: library("metalite.sl")  meta_sl_example() |>   prepare_sl_summary(     population = "apat",     observation = "apat",     parameter = "age;gender"   ) |>   format_base_char() |>   rtf_base_char(     source = "Source: [CDISCpilot: adam-adsl]",     path_outdata = tempfile(fileext = ".Rdata"),     path_outtable = tempfile(fileext = ".rtf")   )

title: Subject-level Analysis Using metalite
text: example, define analysis population use adverse events analysis. Consistent input output standard functions. Streamlines mock table generation.

title: Count number of subjects — collect_baseline
text: Count number subjects

title: Count number of subjects — collect_baseline
code: collect_baseline(   meta,   population,   parameter,   type = "Subjects",   use_na = c("ifany", "no", "always"),   display_total = TRUE )

title: Count number of subjects — collect_baseline
text: meta metadata object created metalite. population character value population term name. term name used key link information. parameter character value parameter term name. term name used key link information. type character value control title name, e.g., Subjects Records. use_na character value whether include NA values table. See useNA argument base::table() details. display_total logical value display total column.

title: Count number of subjects — collect_baseline
text: list containing number subjects

title: Count number of subjects — collect_baseline

Data      86       84        84   254 Age (years) #> 2            Missing       0        0         0     0 Age (years) #>  #> $stat #>        name        Placebo Low Dose   High Dose    Total #>  #> $pop #>        name  Placebo Low Dose High Dose    Total   var_label #> 1     65-80 48.83721 55.95238  65.47619 56.69291 Age (years) #> 2       <65 16.27907  9.52381  13.09524 12.99213 Age (years) #> 3       >80 34.88372 34.52381  21.42857 30.31496 Age (years) #> 4      Mean       NA       NA        NA       NA Age (years) #> 5        SD       NA       NA        NA       NA Age (years) #> 6        SE       NA       NA        NA       NA Age (years) #> 7    Median       NA       NA        NA       NA Age (years) #> 8       Min       NA       NA        NA       NA Age (years) #> 9 title: Format AE specific analysis — format_ae_specific_subgroup
code: format_ae_specific_subgroup(   outdata,   display = c("n", "prop"),   digits_prop = 1,   digits_ci = 1,   digits_p = 3,   digits_dur = c(1, 1),   digits_events = c(1, 1),   mock = FALSE )

title: Format AE specific analysis — format_ae_specific_subgroup
text: outdata outdata object created prepare_ae_specific(). display character vector measurement displayed. n: Number subjects AE. prop: Proportion subjects AE. total: Total columns. dur: Average AE duration. events: Average number AE per subject. digits_prop numeric value number digits proportion value. digits_ci numeric value number digits confidence interval digits_p numeric value number digits p-value . digits_dur numeric value number digits average duration AE. digits_events numeric value number digits average number AE per subjects. mock Logical. Display mock table .

title: Prepare data for baseline characteristic table — format_base_char
text: outdata metadata object created prepare_sl_summary(). display_col Column wants display table. term selected c("n", "prop", "total"). digits_prop Number digits proportion columns. display_stat vector statistics term name. term name selected c("mean", "sd", "se", "median", "q1 q3", "range", "q1", "q3", "min", "max").

what: Create metadata for subject-level analysis table — meta_sl
title: Create metadata for subject-level analysis table — meta_sl
text: Create metadata subject-level analysis table

title: Create metadata for subject-level analysis table — meta_sl
code: meta_sl(   dataset_population,   dataset_observation = NULL,   population_term,   observation_term = NULL,   parameter_term = "age;race;gender",   parameter_var = "AGE^AGEGR1;RACE;SEX",   parameter_labels = NULL,   analysis_term = "base_char",   analysis_title = "Participant Baseline Characteristics by Treatment Group",   population_subset = SAFFL == "Y",   observation_subset = NULL,   population_label = "All Participants as Treated",   treatment_group = "TRT01A" )

title: Create metadata for subject-level analysis table — meta_sl
text: dataset_population Source dataset population. dataset_observation Source dataset observation population_term character value population term name. observation_term character value observation term name. parameter_term character value parameter term name. multiple terms, separated semicolon (;). parameter_var character value parameter variable name. multiple variables, separated semicolon (;). group variable can specified followed variable hat symbol (^). parameter_labels character vector parameter label name. length vector number parameter terms. label input data used NA variable specified. analysis_term character value analysis term name. analysis_title character value analysis title name. population_subset unquoted condition selecting populations dataset population. observation_subset unquoted condition selecting populations dataset observation population_label character value population label. treatment_group character value treatment group name.

title: Create metadata for subject-level analysis table — meta_sl
text: metalite object.

title: Create metadata for subject-level analysis table — meta_sl
code: meta_sl(   dataset_population = r2rtf::r2rtf_adsl,   population_term = "apat",   parameter_term = "age;race",   parameter_var = "AGE^AGEGR1;RACE" ) #> ADaM metadata:  #>    .$data_population 	Population data with 254 subjects  #>    .$data_observation 	Observation data with 254 records  #>    .$plan 	Analysis plan with 1 plans  #>  #>  #>   Analysis population type: #>     name        id    group #> 1 'apat' 'USUBJID' 'TRT01A' #>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              var #> 1 STUDYID, USUBJID, SUBJID, SITEID, SITEGR1, ARM, TRT01P, TRT01PN, TRT01A, TRT01AN, TRTSDT, TRTEDT, TRTDUR, AVGDD, CUMDOSE, AGE, AGEGR1, AGEGR1N, AGEU, RACE, RACEN, SEX, ETHNIC, SAFFL, ITTFL, EFFFL, COMP8FL, COMP16FL, COMP24FL, DISCONFL, DSRAEFL, DTHFL, BMIBL, BMIBLGR1, HEIGHTBL, WEIGHTBL, EDUCLVL, DISONSDT, DURDIS, DURDSGR1, VISIT1DT, RFSTDTC, RFENDTC, VISNUMEN, RFENDT, DCDECOD, DCREASCD, MMSETOT #>         subset                         label #> 1 SAFFL == 'Y' 'All Participants as Treated' #>  #>  #>   Analysis observation type: #>     name        id    group #> 1 'apat' 'USUBJID' 'TRT01A' #>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              var #> 1 STUDYID, USUBJID, SUBJID, SITEID, SITEGR1, ARM, TRT01P, TRT01PN, TRT01A, TRT01AN, TRTSDT, TRTEDT, TRTDUR, AVGDD, CUMDOSE, AGE, AGEGR1, AGEGR1N, AGEU, RACE, RACEN, SEX, ETHNIC, SAFFL, ITTFL, EFFFL, COMP8FL, COMP16FL, COMP24FL, DISCONFL, DSRAEFL, DTHFL, BMIBL, BMIBLGR1, HEIGHTBL, WEIGHTBL, EDUCLVL, DISONSDT, DURDIS, DURDSGR1, VISIT1DT, RFSTDTC, RFENDTC, VISNUMEN, RFENDT, DCDECOD, DCREASCD, MMSETOT #>         subset label #> 1 SAFFL == 'Y'    '' #>  #>  #>   Analysis parameter type: #>     name  label subset #> 1  'age'  'Age'        #> 2 'race' 'Race'        #>  #>  #>   Analysis function: #>          name label #> 1 'base_char'    '' #>

what: Display interactive baseline characteristic tables with AE subgroup analysis — react_base_char
title: Display interactive baseline characteristic tables with AE subgroup analysis — react_base_char
text: Display interactive baseline characteristic tables AE subgroup analysis

title: Display interactive baseline characteristic tables with AE subgroup analysis — react_base_char
code: react_base_char(   metadata_sl,   metadata_ae,   population = "apat",   observation = "wk12",   display_total = TRUE,   sl_parameter = "age;gender;race",   ae_subgroup = c("gender", "race"),   ae_specific = "rel",   width = 1200 )

title: Display interactive baseline characteristic tables with AE subgroup analysis — react_base_char
text: metadata_sl metadata created metalite, builds baseline characteristic table metadata_ae metadata created metalite, builds AE subgroup specific table population character value population term name. term name used key link information. observation character value observation term name. term name used key link information. display_total Display total column . sl_parameter character value parameter term name baseline characteristic table. term name used key link information. ae_subgroup vector strubf specify subgroups AE subgroup specific table. ae_specific string specifying AE specific category. width numeric value width table pixels.

title: Display interactive baseline characteristic tables with AE subgroup analysis — react_base_char
text: reactable combing baseline characteristic table AE subgroup specific tables.

title: Display interactive baseline characteristic tables with AE subgroup analysis — react_base_char
code: if (interactive()) {   react_base_char(     metadata_sl = meta_sl_example(),     metadata_ae = metalite.ae::meta_ae_example(),     population = "apat",     observation = "wk12",     display_total = TRUE,     sl_parameter = "age;gender;race",     ae_subgroup = c("age", "race", "gender"),     ae_specific = "rel",     width = 1200   ) }

title: Baseline characteristic table — rtf_base_char
text: Baseline characteristic table

title: Baseline characteristic table — rtf_base_char
code: rtf_base_char(   outdata,   source,   col_rel_width = NULL,   text_font_size = 9,   orientation = "portrait",   footnotes = NULL,   title = NULL,   path_outdata = NULL,   path_outtable = NULL )

title: Baseline characteristic table — rtf_base_char
text: outdata outdata object created prepare_sl_summary(). source character value data source. col_rel_width Column relative width vector e.g. c(2,1,1) refers 2:1:1. Default NULL equal column width. text_font_size Text font size.  vary text font size column, use numeric vector length vector equal number columns displayed e.g. c(9,20,40). orientation Orientation 'portrait' 'landscape'. footnotes character vector table footnotes. title Term "analysis", "observation" "population") collecting title metadata character vector table titles. path_outdata character string outdata path. path_outtable character string outtable path.

title: Baseline characteristic table — rtf_base_char
text: RTF file source dataset baseline characteristic table.

title: Baseline characteristic table — rtf_base_char
code: meta <- meta_sl_example()  meta |>   prepare_base_char(     population = "apat",     parameter = "age;gender"   ) |>   format_base_char() |>   rtf_base_char(     source = "Source: [CDISCpilot: adam-adsl]",     path_outdata = tempfile(fileext = ".Rdata"),     path_outtable = tempfile(fileext = ".rtf")   ) #> The outdata is saved in/tmp/RtmpGmiGBw/file178a15f2704a.Rdata #> The output is saved in/tmp/RtmpGmiGBw/file178a22f4fb31.rtf

title: Format Treatment Compliance Analysis — rtf_trt_compliance
text: outdata outdata object created prepare_sl_summary(). source character value data source. col_rel_width Column relative width vector e.g. c(2,1,1) refers 2:1:1. Default NULL equal column width. text_font_size Text font size.  vary text font size column, use numeric vector length vector equal number columns displayed e.g. c(9,20,40). orientation Orientation 'portrait' 'landscape'. footnotes character vector table footnotes. title Term "analysis", "observation" "population") collecting title metadata character vector table titles. path_outdata character string outdata path. path_outtable character string outtable path.

title: Format Treatment Compliance Analysis — rtf_trt_compliance
text: list analysis raw datasets.

title: Format Treatment Compliance Analysis — rtf_trt_compliance
code: meta <- meta_sl_example()  meta |>   prepare_trt_compliance(parameter = "comp8;comp16") |>   format_trt_compliance() |>   rtf_trt_compliance(     source = "Source: [CDISCpilot: adam-adsl]",     path_outdata = tempfile(fileext = ".Rdata"),     path_outtable = tempfile(fileext = ".rtf")   ) #> The outdata is saved in/tmp/RtmpGmiGBw/file178a4718d9c0.Rdata #> The output is saved in/tmp/RtmpGmiGBw/file178a2635e2d3.rtf
